rationale: No intensifier or comparative directly modifies a risk-adjective.
statement_text: The peak body representing egg producers, Australian Eggs, said the egg supply was not at risk and purchase limits 'can send the wrong message to consumers.'

rationale: 'not at risk' is Reassuring. 'send the wrong message' describes reaction. No Q2 cues.
statement_text: The peak body representing egg producers, Australian Eggs, said the egg supply was not at risk and purchase limits 'can send the wrong message to consumers.'
